channel.title: Can't get onto my server w/o localhost
channel.description: Well, When I go on silab and put in Localhost (or 127.0.0.1 :P) into the IP I can get on my server, but when I try the no-ip I chose I can't. I must be doing something right, and something wrong obviously, if anyone knows what it might be just suggest how I can fix it. If you need to know anything in specific, ask a specific question ^.^
